name: The Shadow of Lady Jane
description:
The Shadow of Lady Jane is a 2 player local co-op horror game set in two dimensions and is inspired by the Georgian era. Player one must retrieve the correct artifacts in the real world guided by player two who is in the spirit realm. Helping each other to solve the riddles, player two directs player one safely to the artifact as they can see Lady Jane's path!

To note - this is an original game, however, I used the Fungus package from the Unity Store for executing the dialogue. Here is a link to this package: Fungus in the Unity Store. I used a wooden floor material and plastic material from Substance Painter also - everything else is my work. :)
